data.question: Among the following, on which architectural pattern is AngularJS based?
State whether true or false:  AngularJS provides reusable components
Choose the correct syntax for writing AngularJS expression.
Choose the reactor which is used to bind the application data to the HTML view in AngularJS.
Choose the correct statement about the lowercase filter.
options: it is a function that takes text as input.
the lowercase filter converts a text to lowercase text.

data.question: Choose the advantage of Angular JS among the following.
options: it uses dependency injection and makes use of separation of concerns.

data.question: The functionality of angular controllers in the application is
options: an angular controller is used for displaying the data.
an angular controller is used for controlling the data.
